text: HI Cameron, many thanks! To confirm - we’d have to get operations hub to auto-delete records? It’s not possible to send API calls to do the deletion without it?

Hi, <@U05E77XEY4V>. Do you have any update?
I'm also wondering about setting the user's permission in the HS portal. I don't see any toggle related to *sequences* inside *automation tab*.

If you wanted to host the code in HubSpot, then yes that’s correct. You could also use a third-party tool like Zapier to run the code, which could be cheaper depending on the volume of deletions and how many other things you would want to do.
For posterity: looks like this issue has been resolved.

Looks like you’re on the right track! You should be able to use your PRE_ACTION_EXECUTION function to take the `object[properties][key]`  value and insert it into the `webhookUrl`  parameter that the function returns. Docs <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions#execution-functions|here>. Are you having trouble with that?

Hello Everyone here,
It would be great if anyone help us out to know company endpoint along with filter params we can send to it? Say  GET`/crm/v3/objects/companies`  to fetch companies records, can anyone help us out to fetch only recent updated/added company data? As we connected with Support but they routed us here to get exact solution to most recent company data added/updated. We are following this <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/companies#retrieve-companies|page> for retrieving company object records.

Thanks in advance, let me know if we need to add more detailing to the above request?

Hey <@U07K8PX5HM3> - this is a peer-to-peer developer community. You may not always receive answers to your questions right away, but there are a few things you can do. 1) Search Slack before you ask your question - someone may have asked it before and gotten help and 2) start answering some questions before or after asking yours. See if you can assist, and folks may be more likely to help you out.

Help Please !!!!

HubSpot updated the stripe integration and is not longer sending  information to stripe that I can use to tie with quote.

Before they would send the hs_quote_id in the charges and they would send the line items as a meta_data in the events.

it is not longer the case.

They are only sending the field "checkoutSessionID, FullPaymentAttemptId, hs_pmguid, portalID"


The hs_pmguid seems to be private to them and it is retrievable by the API.

Has anyone experience the same problem and able to fix?
